description:
A classic and durable crew neck sweater.

This versatile fleece is made for general outdoor activities but works excellent for everyday wear.

It is made in our breathable and insulating warm2 fabric, a market-leading midweight fleece quality with great thermal properties.

Weighing 207 g/m², this high-quality recycled polyester is an excellent lightweight all-around fabric with great thermal properties. Its unique constructions trap warm air without stopping moisture transport, and the fabrics are open enough to allow air to circulate.

Key features include ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.

The sweater has a regular fit and articulated arms for good mobility. It's based on men's size.
name: Norrona Norrona Crew Neck - Unisex
